# AVExperienceController.TransitionContext.Status

**Enumeration**

Describes the status of a transition.

## Declaration

```swift
enum Status
```

## Overview

Transitions go through a sequence of `Status`s as they progress.

## Enumeration Cases

- **AVExperienceController.TransitionContext.Status.finished(result:)**: Transition finished. Perform cleanup based on result.
- **AVExperienceController.TransitionContext.Status.preparing**: The transition is preparing for `toExperience`.
- **AVExperienceController.TransitionContext.Status.transitioning**: The transition is in progress.

## Conforms To

- Equatable

items.description: Transition finished. Perform cleanup based on result.
items.name: AVExperienceController.TransitionContext.Status.finished(result:)
